title: How to Install a Dee Zee Tailgate Assist - #DZ43203
description:
In this video, we'll take a look at the installation process of a #DZ43203 Tailgate Assist from Dee Zee. This product is for use on '97-'03 Ford F-150's and '99-'13 Superdutys. If you have a different vehicle, please visit one of our videos below for your installation steps:

#DZ43100 - Silverado/Sierra ('99-'06 & '07 classic): 
Coming Soon!
#DZ43101 - Silverado/Sierra ('07-13): 
Coming Soon!
#DZ43200 - Ford F-150 ('04-'13): 
http://youtu.be/kGHKQygeToU
#DZ43300 - Dodge Ram ('02-'13): 
http://youtu.be/jMCO8Xbi4X0

To purchase a Tailgate Assist for your truck, please visit us online at: http://www.deezee.com/products/32813/Truck_Bed_Accessories/Tailgate_Assist/Truck_Tailgate_Assist.html
